subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Seahawks’ pass defense in the current pass-happy N.F.L. can be placed in the same category as those of the 2002 Buccaneers, the 1985 Bears and the 1974 Steelers.
snippet: The Seattle Seahawks’ pass defense in the current pass-happy N.F.L. can be placed in the same category as those of the 2002 Buccaneers, the 1985 Bears and the 1974 Steelers.
